text: When a quo warranto proceeding is against a person for usurping an office, on the relation of a person claiming the same office, the relator shall set forth in his petition the facts upon which he claims to be entitled to the office.
historical:

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Allegations in petition of relator claiming office.
